com.yahoo.tensor.evaluation

Interface EvaluationContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractArrayContext, ArrayContext, Context, DoubleOnlyArrayContext, MapContext, MapEvaluationContext

    @Beta
public interface EvaluationContext
    An evaluation context which is passed down to all nested functions during evaluation. The default context is empty to allow various evaluation frameworks to support their own implementation.
    Author:
    bratseth
